paper_abstract: In this paper, we continue our study on state complexity of combined operations. We study the state complexities of L-1* boolean OR L-2*, boolean OR(k)(i=1) L-i*, L-1* boolean AND L-2*, and boolean AND(k)(i=1) L-i* for regular languages L-i, 1 <= i <= k. We obtain the exact bounds for these combined operations and show that the bounds are different from the mathematical compositions of the state complexities of their component individual operations. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: State complexity of union and intersection of star on k regular languages
